title: About
text:
Samples of tropical forest degradation and regeneration
Interactive map of 600 samples of forest classes distributed across 12 sites in the Brazilian Amazon. The forest classes are:

SF1_15yr (younger second-growth forests)
SF16_32yr (older second-growth forests)
DF (degraded old-growth forest)
UF (undisturbed old-growth forest).

Zoom in and click on a sample to see more information.
For a complete report of samples, click here.
Author: Catherine Torres de Almeida
E-mail: catherine.almeida@unesp.br
Last update: Feb 15, 2023

title: Tropical forest degradation and regeneration
text: Interactive map of 600 samples of forest classes distributed across 12 sites in the Brazilian Amazon. The forest classes are: DF (degraded old-growth forest), SF1_15yr(younger second-growth forests), SF16_32yr(older second-growth forests), and UF (undisturbed old-growth forest). Zoom in and click on a sample to see more information.
